articles.description: Liverpool's outpouring of emotion after clinching the Premier League title was a day of celebration 35 years in the making, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Liverpool win Premier League: Anfield title joy 35 years in the making

articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot pays tribute to his predecessor Jurgen Klopp moments after the club clinched the Premier League title.
articles.title: Liverpool win Premier League: Arne Slot thanks Jurgen Klopp after title win

articles.description: Boss Pep Guardiola has told Manchester City they cannot get "confused" the season has been a success after reaching the FA Cup final.
articles.title: Manchester City: Pep Guardiola dismisses suggestions of successful season after reaching FA Cup final

articles.description: Britain's Daniel Dubois and Ukraine's Oleksandr Usyk will meet in an undisputed heavyweight contest at Wembley Stadium on 19 July.
articles.title: Usyk v Dubois: Daniel Dubois will fight Oleksandr Usyk at Wembley Stadium on 19 July

articles.description: Scott McTominay scores twice as Napoli beat Torino to go three points clear at the top of Serie A with four games left to play.
articles.title: Serie A: Scott McTominay double sends leaders Napoli three points clear

articles.description: As Liverpool stand on the brink of the Premier League title, BBC Sport explores the impact made by Arne Slot this season.
articles.title: Arne Slot: How Liverpool boss took Reds to brink of Premier League title

articles.description: Meet Grace Buckle, a unique heavyweight who wants to make the women's heaviest division as big as the men's.
articles.title: Boxing: Grace Buckle - the heavyweight who provides sign language for the biggest fights

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: Dan Burn, Alexis Mac Allister and Mohamed Salah feature

articles.description: Manchester United fans sang defiantly during the match against Bournemouth, but how far away is title 21?
articles.title: Man Utd reaction: 'Twenty times' - but now Man Utd must exit 'Ice Age'

articles.description: Chris Eubank Jr is "resting" in hospital after "precautionary checks" following his gruelling win over Nigel Benn, says promoter Ben Shalom.
articles.title: Eubank vs Benn: Chris Eubank Jr remains in hospital after win but 'doing well' - promoter Ben Shalom
